forum.name: bugs and glitches
forum.description: post bugs and glitches you find here
forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: see invis parts as editor and body parts

comments.text: setting it so you can see invis parts as editor and then placing a body piece causes the part to stay visible even after disabling the option
to replicate make a new object, make part invisible, set option to see it as editor, place object as a body part, disable option. it should still be visible
